metadata.synopsis: Enthralled by Cazador guard is un-charmed by the player.Different reaction for when uncharmed in combat / outside combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe debugbookGo To Region - Act 3 - LOW - Cazador's Palace - Guard TowerCast Calm Emotions on the guard.

0.speaker: Jaryd
0.text: His voice - it's gone! And so am I.
0.context: NodeContext: waking up from mind control

2.speaker: Jaryd
2.text: What's going on? Why am I fighting?!
2.context: NodeContext: Wakes up from being charmed

1.speaker: Jaryd
1.text: Oh no, to hells with this!
1.context: NodeContext: Fleeing a combat he doesn't want to be in
